EmailTemplate.name: (pob) PO Box no go
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Unfortunately, UPS will not deliver packages to a PO Box. However, we can ship to a physical address or a UPS location where hold services are offered. Please use the following link, to find a "UPS store" or "UPS customer center" location:
https://www.ups.com/dropoff
Please let us know ASAP to where you would like to have your gear shipped to.
Best,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Verifications Team verify@borrowlenses.com (844) 853-6737 x4
